Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Melvina
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Austin, Addison, Narragansett and Belmont due to street blockage near Belmont/Melvina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Austin, Addison, Narragansett, then resume their normal route on Belmont due to street blockage near Belmont/Melvina.

Allow extra travel time.
